description:
Le Parfum Royal Eau De Parfum - Exquisite Regal Elegance in 90ml

Experience the majestic allure of Elie Saab Le Parfum Royal, a captivating oriental floral fragrance that embodies true luxury and sophistication. This exquisite royal perfume creation represents the pinnacle of olfactory artistry, designed for those who appreciate refined elegance and timeless beauty. ‚ú®

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
90ml Women Eau de Parfum High Elie Saab

The Royal Fragrance Journey

Top Notes Mandarin Orange, Blackcurrant, Pear üçê
Heart Notes Turkish Rose, Jasmine, Neroli üå∏
Base Notes Amber, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vanilla üíé

Key Features of Le Parfum Royal

  • Luxurious oriental floral composition with remarkable longevity
  • Opulent amber base notes create a warm, enveloping sensation
  • Perfect balance between fruity freshness and deep, woody sensuality
  • Elegant glass bottle adorned with a royal blue cap symbolizing nobility
  • Ideal for special occasions and evening wear
  • Exceptional sillage that leaves a memorable impression

Created by master perfumer Ma√Øa Lernout, Le Parfum Royal builds upon the legacy of Elie Saab's signature fragrances while elevating the experience to new, majestic heights. Launched in 2019, this oriental perfume pays homage to Elie Saab's Lebanese heritage while embracing modern sophistication. üî•

The exquisite blend begins with sparkling fruit notes that evolve into a heart of precious florals, creating a regal aura that's both powerful and feminine. The rich base notes of amber and woods provide depth and lasting power, ensuring your presence is felt long after you've left the room. üí´

Why Choose Le Parfum Royal?

This premium fragrance represents the perfect balance between Middle Eastern opulence and Western refinement. The bottle itself is a work of art‚Äîa testament to Elie Saab's background in haute couture, featuring clean lines, luxurious weight, and a stunning royal blue cap that signifies prestige and elegance. üåø

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Elie Saab Le Parfum Royal last on skin?

Le Parfum Royal offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The rich concentration of amber, patchouli, and sandalwood in the base notes creates a long-lasting foundation, while the high-quality EDP concentration ensures the fragrance projects beautifully throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin and layer with complementary Elie Saab body products. ‚ú®

Elevate your fragrance collection with Le Parfum Royal‚Äîa true masterpiece that captures the essence of luxury and transforms ordinary moments into extraordinary memories.
short_description: Discover Elie Saab Le Parfum Royal, an opulent oriental floral fragrance featuring mandarin, Turkish rose, and rich amber. This majestic 90ml Eau de Parfum embodies regal elegance with exceptional longevity and sillage, perfect for those who appreciate true luxury.
